default_scheme.label: System default scheme
default_scheme.description: System default gesture scheme, cannot be modified. (Secretly telling you that there is no actual content in this scheme, just when applying the scheme, it is achieved by deleting a custom configuration scheme.

hints.command: Please enter the command you want to execute

gesture_prop_duplicated.title: Duplicated !
gesture_prop_duplicated.description: Now you can go to other scheme and click the paste button ~

scheme_name_conflict.title: Save failed!
scheme_name_conflict.description: Scheme name conflict, please rename it!

code_copied.description: Please paste it into the terminal and run ~

sign_up_hint.title: Verification code has been sent
sign_up_hint.description: Please log in to the mailbox to continue the registration ~

new_version.title: Update found(v{version})
new_version.description_for_startup: Click [{YES}] to view, click [{NO}] ignore this update
new_version.description_for_manual: Visit the official website to see more?

login_for_upload.title: please login
login_for_upload.description: You need to login first to perform upload operations

upload_and_share.title: Share the scheme at the same time?
upload_and_share.description:
If you select [Share], other users can see this scheme and download it;
If you select [Cancel], you can still find this scheme in the [My Upload] list and share.

user_blocked_hint.title: The account has been blocked!
user_blocked_hint.description: If you have any questions, please contact me using email.

share.title: Are you sure to sharing?
share.description: Other users can see this scheme and download it after share
